title: Alysson (footballer, born 1976)
text:
Alysson Marendaz Marins (born May 26, 1976), known as just Alysson, is a Brazilian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player.
Career.
As a <a href="Journeyman%20%28football%29">journeyman</a>, Alysson Marendaz Marins has played for <a href="CR%20Vasco%20da%20Gama">CR Vasco da Gama</a>, on loan for <a href="Serrano%20Football%20Club">Serrano Football Club</a>, <a href="Centro%20de%20Futebol%20Zico%20Sociedade%20Esportiva">CFZ do Rio</a>, <a href="AIK%20Fotboll">AIK Fotboll</a>, <a href="Kalmar%20FF">Kalmar FF</a> and <a href="OFK%20Ostersund">OFK Ostersund</a> in <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a>, <a href="Perak%20FA">Perak FA</a> in <a href="Malaysia">Malaysia</a>, and <a href="Chinese%20Super%20League">Chinese Super League</a> club <a href="Beijing%20Guoan">Beijing Guoan</a>. He played for CFZ-Imbituba (SC)<a href="https%3A//web.archive.org/web/20090510063553/http%3A//www.cfzimbituba.com.br/"></a>, Ex.Imbituba Futebol Clube. In 2010 Alysson signed a contract with Avai-SC.
